snippet.title: Kids Don't Listen? Change How You Give Directions
snippet.description: When kids don't listen, parents need to change how they give instructions. ... A simple change in the way you word something can greatly improve your chances ... For example, if you want a child to pick up his toys, don't say, “Can you please ...
